system_wrapper
module system_wrapper #(
parameter 
clock_speed
 = 
2000000,
parameter 
baud_rate
 = 
1000000,
parameter 
mil1553_sample_rate
 = 
2000000
) ( input clk, input [1:0] push_buttons, inout [7:0] pmod_ja, input ftdi_tx, output ftdi_rx )

System wrapper for pl

Parameters
clock_speed
parameter

Requested Master Clock Speed from clk wiz

baud_rate
parameter

UART BAUD rate

mil1553_sample_rate
parameter

Sample rate for 1553, must be 2 MHz or above, and divide evenly into clock_speed.

Ports
clk

Input clock for all clocks

push_buttons

Buttons used for reset (push button 0).

pmod_ja

1553 PMOD device port (JA)

ftdi_tx

FTDI UART input (TX)

ftdi_rx

FTDI UART output (RX)

Instantianted Modules
inst_clk_wiz_1
clk_wiz_1 inst_clk_wiz_1 (
.
clk_out1(sys_clk),
.
reset(push_buttons[0]),
.
clk_in1(clk)
)

Module instance of clock wizard to change input clock to requested clock speed.

.

) inst_uart_1553_core ( .aclk(sys_clk), .arstn(resetn), .uart_clk(sys_clk), .uart_rstn(resetn), .rx_UART(ftdi_tx), .tx_UART(ftdi_rx), .rts_UART(), .cts_UART(1'b1), .rx0_1553(pmod_ja[0]), .rx1_1553(pmod_ja[1]), .tx0_1553(pmod_ja[2]), .tx1_1553(pmod_ja[3]), .en_tx_1553(pmod_ja[4]) )

Module instance of the 1553 UART with all cores tied together as a common device.
